text: Takozh, vony nadto stingy koly mayutʹ spravu z vas. Yakshcho budʹ shcho zahrozhuye spilʹnoti, vy bachyte , shcho yikhni ochi z·hortaye z strakhom, tak, yakby smertʹ vzhe prybula yim. Odnoho razu kryza zakinchuyetʹsya, vony khlyst vy z hostrymy yazykamy. Vony nadto stingy z yikhnim bahat·stvom. Tse - ne viruyuchi, ta, otzhe, BOH znyshchyv yikhni pratsi. Tse ye lehke dlya BOHA zrobyty
